Game information:  



Crimes and Punishments - a detective quest devoted to investigations
of the famous detective Sherlock Holmes. Characterized by a high
consideration. Each case has its own unique and famously twisted
story - the players, in turn, will have to collect evidence bit
by bit, and then put them together to make a final decision and
decide the fate of the suspects. Use awesome skills of Sherlock
Holmes - the most extraordinary detective. Unlike other similar
games, Crimes and Punishments completely gives control in your
hands. You decide who to question, what evidence to collect and
how to map all the facts together to create a business. You can
even put an innocent man. In the case of making a wrong decision
unintended consequences may arise precisely where you least expect
them. Crimes and Punishments in you will take part in a number
of exciting investigations of killings, kidnappings and theft.
The game includes 6 volume of cases, each of which has multiple
endings. In all cases it is necessary to examine the crime scene,
find clues, conduct historical research, to find the suspects,
run interrogations, examine the evidence and come to a final decision.
Superb graphics and photorealistic landscapes bring realism in Crimes
and Punishments. Never before has the game does not let you down so
close to the scene of the crime, or the cold and harsh justice.



Game Features:  

Holmes returns - under your strict control he will
take part in a series of investigations.

Feel the sharpness all the exciting investigations
using the legendary skills of Holmes and his wit.

Interrogate suspects and collect evidence to convict
or release those whom you choose.

Connect all the dots using the deductive method of Sherlock,
you will access to the new challenges and even closer to get
close to the mystery.

Cooperate with famous friends like Toby, Dr. Watson and Inspector Lestrade.


RePack Features:  

Sherlock Holmes - Crimes & Punishments
Do not cut / recoded
